attributes.action: SCOTLAND/ ENGLAND/ WALES/ N IRELAND SEPERATE EUROVISION SONGS
attributes.additional_details:
Individual entries for Scotland, Northern Ireland, England and Wales at Eurovision from now on!
-	Each funded by TV station per country
-	Songs voted for by the public at song festivals promoting new music and not mass production or BBC choosing for us or offering terrible acts
-	End BBC monopoly and sole rights from EBU to do this
-	By doing this let each country showcase their talents, sole, music, culture, fashion, performance and flare to promote tourism and reputation on one of the largest world stages e.g. celtic music
-	UK contributes a lot of money, but no one in uk is engaged in our acts – if we show case each country properly as we have the talent and the money - the money spent broadcasting will be returned with tourism
